creditline: Anonymous Gift to honor the Metropolitan-Mt. Sinai Hospital
text: The Shema (Deuteronomy 6:4-9) commands, And you shall write them on the doorposts of your house and on your gates.  To fulfill this commandment, the Shema is written on a tiny scroll of parchment along with a companion passage, Deut. 11:13-21.  The scroll is placed in a case and affixed to the right side of every doorpost at an angle while reciting a special blessing.  This mezuzah is from the Metropolitan-Mount Sinai Medical Center, which closed in 1991.
title: Mezuzah (doorpost)
